messages.action.noSpeakersError: :robot: :weary: No bots are available to play in <#{voice_channel_id}>, try again when one is
messages.response.notInVoiceChannelError: :robot: :weary: You're not in a voice channel
messages.response.queuedNoSpeakers: :robot: :see_no_evil: Queued [{song_title}](<{song_url}>). No bots are available right now, use `/join` when one is to start playing here
messages.response.skipMoreVotesNeeded.singular: :robot: :+1: 1 more vote is needed to skip [{song_title}](<{song_url}>) in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.skipMoreVotesNeeded.plural: :robot: :+1: {count} more votes are needed to skip [{song_title}](<{song_url}>) in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.skipAlreadyVotedError: :robot: :triumph: You've already voted to skip this song [{song_title}](<{song_url}>) in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.nothingIsQueuedError: :robot: :weary: Nothing is queued to play in <#{voice_channel_id}>
messages.response.alreadyPlayingError: :robot: :weary: A song is already playing in <#{voice_channel_id}>
